mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.*from(select * from camp_notice order by 1 desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select room_no as roomNo, camp_no as campNo, room_member as roomMember, room_name as roomName, room_price roomPrice from camproom where room_no=#{_parameter}

select camp_no as campNo, ceo_id as ceoId, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg from camp where camp_no=#{_parameter}
select user_no as userNo, user_name as userName, user_point as userPoint, user_level as userLevel, user_id as userId from user_tbl where user_no=#{_parameter}
select user_point from user_tbl where user_no=#{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into point values(point_seq.nextval,#{userNo},null,null,null,#{totalPoint},#{userUsePoint},'예약 시 포인트 사용',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT rev_no as revNo, user_id as userId, camp_no as campNo, rev_contents as revContents, rev_star as revStar, rev_date as revDate, rev_image as revImage, rev_heart as revHeart FROM review where camp_no=#{_parameter} ORDER BY rev_no desc) A

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rNum, n.* FROM ( SELECT camp_notice_no AS campNoticeNo, camp_no AS campNo, camp_notice_title AS campNoticeTitle, camp_notice_contents AS campNoticeContents, camp_notice_date AS campNoticeDate, camp_notice_filename AS campNoticeFileName, camp_notice_filepath AS campNoticeFilePath FROM camp_notice ORDER BY 1 DESC )n) WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT camp_notice_no AS campNoticeNo, camp_no AS campNo, camp_notice_title AS campNoticeTitle, camp_notice_contents AS campNoticeContents, camp_notice_date AS campNoticeDate, camp_notice_filename AS campNoticeFileName, camp_notice_filepath AS campNoticeFilePath FROM camp_notice where camp_notice_no=#{_parameter}

select res_no as resNo, user_no as userNo, camp_no as campNo, camp_room as campRoom, res_in_date as resInDate, res_out_date as resOutDate, res_in_time as resInTime, res_out_time as resOutTime, res_member as resMember, res_price as resPrice, res_memo as resMemo, res_count as resCount from reservation where camp_room=#{_parameter}
mapper.update: update user_tbl set user_point = (user_point-#{userUsePoint}) where user_no = #{userNo} update rev_contents set
mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_name as userName, user_phone as userPhone, user_level as userLevel, user_birth as userBirth, user_date as userDate, user_gender as userGender, user_addr as userAddr, user_point as userPoint from user_tbl where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
select user_no as userNo, user_name as userName, user_point as userPoint, user_level as userLevel, user_id as userId from user_tbl where user_id=#{_parameter}

select camp_no as campNo, ceo_id as ceoId, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg from camp where ceo_id=#{userId}
